main event: On August 21, 1957, there was a visual UFO sighting airborne over the Atlantic lasting for 3 minutes, during which a white flash was observed reaching very high in the sky and making a sharp braking maneuver.
interesting points: The UFO sighting involved a white flash reaching high in the sky and making a sharp braking maneuver.
There were three aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
The report indicates a long-distance travel for the observed bright flash.
The sighting was documented from the American Clipper aircraft.
The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and was witnessed by a civilian captain.
sighted object: bright white flash in the sky
witnesses: Civilian captain and possibly other crew members
